cards.name: Gesamt-Umsatz
cards.query: SELECT total_revenue FROM analytics.executive_dashboard

cards.name: Anzahl Transaktionen
cards.query: SELECT total_transactions FROM analytics.executive_dashboard

cards.name: Durchschnittlicher Bestellwert
cards.query: SELECT avg_order_value FROM analytics.executive_dashboard

cards.name: TÃ¤glicher Ã˜ Umsatz
cards.query: SELECT avg_daily_revenue FROM analytics.executive_dashboard

cards.name: Monatlicher Umsatz-Trend
cards.query: SELECT month, gross_revenue FROM analytics.monthly_revenue ORDER BY month

cards.name: Umsatzwachstum %
cards.query: SELECT month, revenue_growth_percent FROM analytics.revenue_growth WHERE revenue_growth_percent IS NOT NULL ORDER BY month DESC LIMIT 12

cards.name: Letzte Transaktionen
cards.query: SELECT transaction_date, product_name, platform_name, sale_price, buyer_destination_country FROM analytics.recent_transactions LIMIT 10

cards.name: Top 20 Produkte
cards.query: SELECT product_name, total_sales, total_revenue, avg_sale_price, brand_name FROM analytics.top_products_revenue LIMIT 20

cards.name: Umsatz nach Marke
cards.query: SELECT brand_name, total_revenue FROM analytics.brand_performance ORDER BY total_revenue DESC LIMIT 10

cards.name: VerkÃ¤ufe nach Marke
cards.query: SELECT brand_name, total_sales FROM analytics.brand_performance ORDER BY total_sales DESC LIMIT 10

cards.name: Brand Marktanteil
cards.query: SELECT extracted_brand, total_revenue FROM analytics.brand_deep_dive_overview ORDER BY total_revenue DESC

cards.name: Brand Performance Ãœbersicht
cards.query: SELECT extracted_brand, total_transactions, unique_products, total_revenue, avg_sale_price FROM analytics.brand_deep_dive_overview ORDER BY total_revenue DESC

cards.name: Brand Monatstrends
cards.query: SELECT month, extracted_brand, revenue FROM analytics.brand_monthly_performance WHERE month >= DATE_TRUNC('month', CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '12 months') ORDER BY month

cards.name: Nike Produktlinien
cards.query: SELECT nike_line, total_sales, total_revenue, avg_price, unique_products FROM analytics.nike_product_breakdown ORDER BY total_revenue DESC

cards.name: Nike Line Performance
cards.query: SELECT nike_line, total_revenue FROM analytics.nike_product_breakdown ORDER BY total_revenue DESC

cards.name: StockX Umsatz
cards.query: SELECT total_revenue FROM analytics.platform_performance WHERE platform_name = 'Stockx'

cards.name: Durchschn. GebÃ¼hren
cards.query: SELECT avg_fee_amount FROM analytics.platform_performance WHERE platform_name = 'Stockx'

cards.name: Anzahl Transaktionen
cards.query: SELECT total_transactions FROM analytics.platform_performance WHERE platform_name = 'Stockx'

cards.name: Platform Umsatzverteilung
cards.query: SELECT platform_name, total_revenue FROM analytics.platform_performance ORDER BY total_revenue DESC

cards.name: Platform Performance Details
cards.query: SELECT platform_name, total_transactions, total_revenue, avg_transaction_value, total_fees_paid FROM analytics.platform_performance ORDER BY total_revenue DESC

cards.name: VerkÃ¤ufe nach Land
cards.query: SELECT destination_country, total_revenue FROM analytics.sales_by_country WHERE destination_country != 'Unknown' ORDER BY total_revenue DESC LIMIT 15

cards.name: Top ZiellÃ¤nder
cards.query: SELECT destination_country, total_sales, total_revenue, avg_order_value FROM analytics.sales_by_country ORDER BY total_revenue DESC LIMIT 20

cards.name: Revenue nach Land
cards.query: SELECT destination_country, total_revenue FROM analytics.sales_by_country WHERE destination_country != 'Unknown' ORDER BY total_revenue DESC LIMIT 10

cards.name: TÃ¤glicher Umsatz (30 Tage)
cards.query: SELECT sale_date, gross_revenue FROM analytics.daily_revenue WHERE sale_date >= CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '30 days' ORDER BY sale_date

cards.name: Umsatz nach Wochentag
cards.query: SELECT day_of_week_name, total_revenue FROM analytics.sales_by_weekday ORDER BY day_of_week_num

cards.name: Transaktionen nach Wochentag
cards.query: SELECT day_of_week_name, total_sales FROM analytics.sales_by_weekday ORDER BY day_of_week_num

cards.name: TÃ¤gliche Performance
cards.query: SELECT sale_date, transactions_count, gross_revenue, avg_order_value FROM analytics.daily_revenue ORDER BY sale_date DESC LIMIT 30
